name: Swarm (itch)
description:
Grab a friend, or three. Actually, grab five friends, and huddle around your keyboard. The aim is to keep up with the leading player, and take their place. The decision of whether to slow down for everybody else when you steal the front is up to you.

Press any key at the title screen to join the game. Cherish your key. Tap it to jump (and double-jump), and hold it speed up.

Use your key during the Selection menu to vote for the level to play.

Press backspace to return to the main menu.

Inspired by the times spent playing linked emulators with siblings huddled around an old Dell laptop all using the same keyboard

Let me know what you think (@aemyn)

Current focus is on making a touchscreen-compatible build. (16/05/30)
